subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: As Houston chases its first playoff berth in a decade, the players say they can learn from their young shortstop, Correa, the No. 1 pick in the 2012 draft.
snippet: As Houston chases its first playoff berth in a decade, the players say they can learn from their young shortstop, Correa, the No. 1 pick in the 2012 draft.
